author: 0xdhruv_
content:
Hey guys!
I have a doubt regarding reorgs, don't know where to ask so asking here. Is there a possibility of long reorg happening in ethereum PoS of greater than 2 epochs? Or since the blocks deeper than 2 epochs are considered finalised, it is impossible?

Tagging <@539495253418180618> for visibility üôè

author: sky.cactus
content: In theory, anything that isn't finalized can reorg.

author: sky.cactus
content: And there is no hard guarantee on time to finality (the chain can, in theory, fail to finalize indefinitely).

author: sky.cactus
content: Pragmatically, finality will probably happen on schedule except during an attack and reorgs probably won't be more than a handful of blocks deep.
